eqnarray:
\begin{eqnarray}
\label{fluxn2mix}
& F_{0129} = F_{0349} = - 2\beta \sin \gamma
\ \ ,\ \ \ \ 
F_{y129} = F_{y349} = - 2\beta, & \nonumber \\
& F_{1256} = F_{1278} = F_{3456} = F_{3478} = - 2\beta \cos \gamma, &
\

\begin{eqnarray}
ds^2 &=& - dt^2 + dy^2 + \sum_{i=5}^9 (dx^i)^2
+ \sum_{i=1}^2 \Big[ d\rho_i^2 
+ \rho_i^2 \left( 1 - \beta^2 \cos^2 \gamma \, \rho_i^2 \right)
d\phi_i^2 \Big] \nonumber \\
&&
- 2 \beta \left( dt + \sin \gamma \, dy \right) 
\left( \rho_1^2 d\phi_1 + \rho_2^2 d\phi_2 \right).
\

\begin{eqnarray}
\label{fluxpp28}
& F_{(3)} = 2\beta \sin \gamma dx^+ \left( d\tilde{x}^1 d\tilde{x}^2
+ d\tilde{x}^3 d\tilde{x}^4 + d\tilde{x}^5 d\tilde{x}^6
- d\tilde{x}^7 d\tilde{x}^8 \right), & \nonumber \\
& F_{(5)} = 4 \beta \cos \gamma 
dx^+ \left(d\tilde{x}^1 d\tilde{x}^2 d\tilde{x}^3 
d\tilde{x}^4 + d\tilde{x}^5 d\tilde{x}^6 d\tilde{x}^7 d\tilde{x}^8 \right), &
\

\begin{eqnarray}
\label{fluxn4iia2}
& F_{12} = F_{34} = F_{56} = - F_{78} = - 2 \beta \sin \gamma \ \ ,\ \ \ \ 
F_{012y} = F_{034y} = F_{056y} = - F_{078y} = 2 \beta \sin \gamma, & \nonumber \\ 
& H_{12y} = H_{34y} = H_{56y} = - H_{78y} = - 2 \beta
\ \ ,\ \ \ \ 
F_{1234} = F_{5678} = 4 \beta \cos \gamma. 
 & 
\

\begin{eqnarray}
S=\frac{1}{\pi\alpha'}\int d\tau d\sigma \left[\partial_{+}X^i\partial_{-}X^i
-\beta \alpha 'p^+ J_{ij}X^i\partial_{\tau}X^j +\beta wR J_{ij}X^i\partial_{\sigma}X^j
\right],
\

\begin{eqnarray}
H&=&\frac{i}{32\pi(\alpha')^2 p^+}\int_0^{\pi} d\sigma\left[
\bar{S}^1 \dot{S}^1 + S^1 \dot{\bar{S}}^1
+ \bar{S}^2 \dot{S}^2 + S^2 \dot{\bar{S}}^2 \right],\label{hf}\\
&=&\frac{i}{32\pi(\alpha')^2 p^+}\int_0^{\pi} d\sigma
\left[\bar{\mathcal{S}}^1 \dot{\mathcal{S}}^1
+\mathcal{S}^1\dot{\bar{\mathcal{S}}}^1+
\bar{\mathcal{S}}^2 \dot{\mathcal{S}}^2
+\mathcal{S}^2\dot{\bar{\mathcal{S}}}^2
+2i\beta\alpha' p^+ J (\bar{\mathcal{S}}^1\mathcal{S}^1+\mathcal{S}^2 \bar{\mathcal{S}}^2)
\right].\nonumber
\

\begin{eqnarray}
&& E^2-p_{y}^2 = 
\frac{2}{\alpha'} \sum_{n \in \mathbb{Z}} \left[ (N^{+}_{n} + F^+_n) 
\sqrt{(n + \alpha'\beta p_{y})^2 +\beta^2 {\alpha'}^2 (E^2-p_{y}^2)}
\right. \nonumber \\ 
&& \left.
+ (N^{-}_{n} + F^-_n) \sqrt{(n - \alpha'\beta p_{y})^2
+\beta^2 {\alpha'}^2 (E^2-p_{y}^2)} \right]
+ 2\beta E \sum_{n \in \mathbb{Z}} 
\left( N^{+}_{n}+F^{+}_{n} - N^{-}_{n}- F^{-}_{n} \right)
\nonumber \\ &&
+ \sum_{i=1}^4 p_i^2 
+ \frac{2}{\alpha'}\sum_{n=-\infty}^{\infty} |n| ( N_n + F_n ) \ , 
\

\begin{eqnarray}
&&ds^2=f^{-\frac12}\Bigl(-(dt+\beta\sum_{i=1}^4 J_{ij}x^i dx^j)^2
+\sum_{i=1}^4{(dx^i)^2}\Bigr)+f^{\frac12}\sum_{i=5}^9(dx^i)^2,\nonumber \\
&&e^{2\phi}=f^{-\frac12},\ 
\ \ \ F_{12}=F_{34}=-2\beta,\ \ \ \ H_{129}=H_{349}=-2\beta,\ \ \nonumber \\
&& F_{0129}=F_{0349}=2\beta,\ \ \ \ 
F_{ijkl}=-\epsilon_{ijklm}\partial_{m}f,\ (5\leq i,j,k,l,m \leq 9),
\

\begin{eqnarray}
W &=& - \frac{1}{2} \Big[ \sigma_1 \sin \gamma + \sigma_3 \cos \gamma \Big]
( J_1 + J_2 ) \nonumber \\
\Omega_+ &=& - \frac{1}{4} \Big[ 2\sigma_1 \sin \gamma -
(1 + J_1 J_2 J_3 J_4 ) \sigma_3 \cos \gamma \Big] ( J_1 + J_2 )
\nonumber \\
Q & = & - \frac{1}{4} \Big[ 2\sigma_1 \sin \gamma -
(1 + J_1 J_2 J_3 J_4 ) \sigma_3 \cos \gamma - 2 i \sigma_2 \Big]
( J_1 + J_2 )
\

\begin{eqnarray}
W &=& - \frac{1}{2} \sin \gamma \,
\sigma_3 ( J_1 + J_2 + J_3 - J_4 ) \nonumber \\
\Omega_+ &=& \frac{1}{4} i \sigma_2
\Big[ (J_1 J_2 + J_3 J_4 ) \cos \gamma
- (J_1 + J_2 + J_3 - J_4 ) \sigma_1 \sin \gamma \Big] ( 1 + J_1 J_2 J_3 J_4)
\nonumber \\
Q &=&i \sigma_2 \left[ \frac{1}{4}
\Big( (J_1 J_2 + J_3 J_4 ) \cos \gamma
- (J_1 + J_2 + J_3 - J_4 ) \sigma_1 \sin \gamma \Big)
( 1 + J_1 J_2 J_3 J_4) \right. \nonumber \\
&& \left. - \frac{1}{2} ( J_1 + J_2 + J_3 - J_4 ) \right] \label{mixedss}
\

\begin{eqnarray}
\label{fluxn2mix}
& F_{0129} = F_{0349} = - 2\beta \sin \gamma
\ \ ,\ \ \ \
